changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.request_changelog ( id int8 NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE), request_id int8 NOT NULL, request_change_timestamp timestamp NOT NULL, "comment" varchar NULL, changed_field_name varchar NOT NULL, prev_field_value varchar NULL, new_field_value varchar NULL, author_id int8 NULL, create_date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, author_auto int8 NULL, author_service_id int8 NULL, CONSTRAINT request_changelog_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
